userblogs-desc: Adds blog functionality with custom namespaces and privacy settings
userblogs-must-login: You must be logged in to manage your blog.
userblogs-error-empty: Title and content cannot be empty.
userblogs-error-invalid-title: Invalid title. Please use only letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
userblogs-error-exists: A blog post with this title already exists.
userblogs-public-label: Make my blog public (show posts on Blog:Recent_posts)
userblogs-public-help: If unchecked, your blog posts will only be visible to you and won't appear on the recent posts page.
userblogs-blog-page-info: Your blog posts are listed at:
userblogs-must-login-comment: You must be logged in to comment.
userblogs-confirm-delete-comment: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
